Ancestry-Human -- Female Versatile Heritage Human Fighter

Half-Orc: Has the orc trait and may take orc and half-orc feats

Skilled Heritage Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +0 on untrained skill checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gains +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Inspire Imitation: Can immediately Aid an ally on a skill check after a critical success on the same skill
Monstrous Peacemaker: +1 Diplomacy and Sense Motive with non-humanoids and creatures marginalized by human society
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Woodland Elf: Can Climb foliage at 12', or 25' on a critical success
Combat
Hit Points: 20 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dwarven Waraxe (+5 1d8+2 S [2h d12]; strength; trained); Sawtooth Saber (+7 1d6+2 S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Incredible Ferocity: Has increased Orc Ferocity effects
Orc Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Falchion; Greataxe; Orc Weapons)
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Falchion; Greataxe)/Weapon Familiarity (Orc Weapons)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Toughness: +1 Hit Points
Unconventional Expertise (Sawtooth Saber): Attack Expert (Sawtooth Saber)
Unconventional Weaponry (Sawtooth Saber): Weapon Familiarity (Sawtooth Saber)
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Double Slice: (2) Makes simultaneous Strikes with 2 melee weapons at the current multiple attack penalty; a non-agile weapon on the second Strike suffers -2 attack
Orc Ferocity: (R) Retains 1 Hit Point and increases the wounded condition by 1 when brought to 0 Hit Points once per hr
Orc Weapon Carnage: Critical hits with a falchion, greataxe, or orc weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon orc weapons
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts flat-footed until the start of the next turn
Victorious Vigor: (R) Reducing a foe to 0 Hit Points gives self 1 temporary Hit Point until the end of the next turn
Woodland Elf: Can always Take Cover within forest terrain
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Orc Superstition: (R) +1 vs. the triggering magic effect
Pervasive Superstition: +1 vs. magic
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: OC1: 2 Attack: Arcane Innate: +5 (charisma; trained); Occult: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 15 (charisma; trained); Occult: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells: Charm (A1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Magic Notes:
Bard Dedication: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 occult cantrips
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Supernatural Charm: Knows the Charm arcane innate spell; can cast it at 1st level once per day
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Adaptive Adept: Knows a cantrip or level 1 spell from a second tradition
Notes
Validation Errors:
Adaptive Adept Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5, adapted cantrip feature (currently 1) and max spell level >= 3
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 1 available vs. 26 allocated
Bard Dedication Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 2, multiclass level requirements waived, charisma modifier (currently 2) >= 2 or multiclass ability requirements waived (currently 1) and bard level == 0
Clever Improviser Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Cooperative Soul Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and cooperative nature feature (currently 1)
Human Heritage Allocation: 1 available vs. 4 allocated
Incredible Ferocity Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and orc ferocity feature (currently 1)
Incredible Improvisation Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and clever improviser feature (currently 1)
Inspire Imitation Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Multitalented Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
Orc Weapon Carnage Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and orc weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Orc Weapon Expertise Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and orc weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Pervasive Superstition Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and orc superstition feature (currently 1)
Supernatural Charm Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Unconventional Expertise Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and unconventional weaponry feature (currently 1)
Victorious Vigor Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
